page.title: 08STORTHES HALL HOSPITAL
page.content: This was a very big hospital for mentally ill people. It used to have 3000 patients,but now it only has 860 patients but that is still very big.It will close in 1993 and all the patients will be sent to live with their own families or in small group homes.Now there are 1100 staff to run the hospital.It stands in 400 acres and the buildings have 5 miles of corridors.They do not know what the buildings could be used for when they are empty.The Deputy Administrator said it could be made into houses or an open prison or something else.We thought it could be useful for a polytechnic to study farming and plants and country wildlife.When we looked round we thought it was like a little village on its own. It seems a very friendly place.
